title: compstak: Jr Data Analyst

title: Charles River Analytics: Sr Software Engineer – Intelligent Systems

description: Seeking an experienced and enthusiastic Software Engineer to design and develop cutting-edge intelligent systems applied to areas such as intelligent tutoring, serious games, crowdsourcing, skill modeling and assessment, and advanced visualization.

description: Seeking an experienced and enthusiastic Software Engineer to design and develop cutting-edge intelligent systems applied to areas such as intelligent tutoring, serious games, crowdsourcing, skill modeling and assessment, and advanced visualization.

title: Charles River Analytics: Software Engineer
description: Seeking a junior to mid-level Software Engineer that loves to write clean and concise code that gets the job done.

title: Apple: Jr. Instrumentation Data Scientist – Exploratory Design Group
description: Seeking an enthusiastic engineer to collaborate with a R&D team of developing a new generation of bio-sensing technologies. The ideal candidate will have experience applying data analysis techniques to understand complex measurements.

title: U. of Tartu: Junior Group Leader (Senior Research Fellow) in Data Analytics
description: The successful applicant will create a new internationally competitive research group starting with a seed grant of 1.25 million euros over 5 years.

title: Northeastern University: Data Science Director
description: Primary responsibilities include teaching and overseeing all aspects of the professional MS program in Data Science. This is a full-time, benefits eligible, non-tenure track position.

title: HelloFresh: Senior Data Scientist
description: To succeed, you will need a hunger for discovering information in massive amounts of data, an attitude towards experimentation and fluency in machine learning techniques and software engineering best practices.

title: Equity Residential: Data Scientist (Director, Data Analytics)
description: Provide advanced analytic insight and thought leadership to support the needs of EQR senior executives and their teams; own the ongoing development and maintenance of a data warehouse of relevant internal and external data.

title: Monash University: Research Fellow – AI Optimisation Group
description: Seeking an enthusiastic researcher with solid skills in any of the following areas: constraint programming, mixed integer programming, SAT and SAT modulo theories, modelling languages and program analysis, to work on new approaches to modelling and solving discrete optimisation problems.

title: Stylight: Data Engineer
description: Seeking a Data Engineer for our Data Platform to become part of our outstanding development team in Munich. You are responsible to develop new features that help us to improve our data gathering and event processing products.

title: Novo Nordisk: Sr Data Scientist
description: The Senior Data Scientist will build machine learning-based tools and processes within the company’s current big data infrastructure such as recommendation engines, automated propensity scoring systems, and A/B testing procedures.

title: University College Dublin: Research Fellow
description: Seeking a Research Fellow to start on a new multi-million-euro, multi-year industry research project, funded by a global technology company.

title: Kent State University: Faculty Tenure-Track – Management and Information Systems
description: Seeking qualified applicants for an open tenure-track position at the rank of Assistant/Associate Professor beginning Spring, 2019.

title: Institute for Defense Analyses (IDA): Research Analyst – Data Scientist
description: Seeking a data scientist with expertise in machine learning and predictive analytics to join the Research Staff of the Cost Analysis and Research Division (CARD).

title: ZS Associates: Data Science Associate Consultant

title: CVS: Application Developer, Rebates Forecasting

title: CVS: Senior Advisor, Trend Analytics – Senior Solution Strategist – Finance

title: CVS: Advisor, Retail Data Strategy Analytics

title: CVS: Director, Retail Data Strategy Analytics
description: Seeking a solid leader to help build out a new data strategy organization that is focused on retail pharmacy data assets at CVS Health.

title: Apple: Sr Software Engineer – Applied Machine Learning
description: Seeking a Senior Software Engineer, to help build innovative software applications. You should have development and implementation experience on large scale critical applications.

title: Apple: Commerce Data Engineer – Apple Media Products

title: Apple: Sr Software Engineer, Applied Machine Learning
description: Seeking an energetic senior software engineer to help us develop, improve, and expand our cutting edge platform to ensure that the performance of our machine learning environment is second-to-none.

title: Virginia Tech: Software Scientist, Machine Learning

title: Memorial Sloan Kettering: Data Scientist

title: Monash U: Lecturer/Sr Lecturer (IT Data Science)
description: Seeking a Lecturer/Senior Lecturer to join our high achieving and highly motivated team of teaching and research staff. Applicants with a track record of high impact research and teaching in machine learning or advanced analytics are encouraged to apply.

title: Monash U: Lecturer/Sr Lecturer Digital Health
description: Seeking up to 6 exceptional academics to take an active role in the Digital Health agenda. These will be continuing level B/C teaching and research positions (equivalent to tenure-track Assistant/Associate Professor).

title: NIH: Chief Data Strategist
description: Seeking an experienced leader to harmonize its broad data science portfolio using cutting-edge approaches, deliver a national, next-generation technology platform to accelerate scientific discovery.

title: Analysis Group: Data Scientist
description: Seeking a Data Scientist who will help develop, maintain and teach new tools and methodologies related to data science and high performance computing.

title: Afresh: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Seeking a Machine Learning Engineer  to join founding-team for developing predictive models for the food supply chain, including forecasting demand, prices, inventory, etc. using deep learning combined with Bayesian statistics, causal inference, and other techniques.
